text: Radu G. Vlădescu (1886 – 1964), a Romanian professor born in Buzău, taught at the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine of the University of Agronomical Sciences and Veterinary Medicine, Bucharest. He was a member of the Romanian Academy and correspondent member of the French Academy. Category:Romanian academics Category:Titular members of the Romanian Academy Category:People from Buzău Category:1886 births Category:1964 deaths
title: Radu G. Vlădescu
